ucdxml:block: ucd.content &= element do-not-emit { element instead { attribute of { one-or-more-code-points }, attribute use { one-or-more-code-points }, attribute because { "Arabic_Tashkil" | "Bengali_Khanda_Ta" | "Deprecated" | "Discouraged" | "Dotless_Form" | "Hamza_Form" | "Indic_Atomic_Consonant" | "Indic_Consonant_Conjunct" | "Indic_Vowel_Letter" | "Malayalam_Chillu" | "None" | "Precomposed_Form" | "Precomposed_Hieroglyph" | "Preferred_Spelling" | "Tamil_Shrii" } }+ }?
